title: Contemporary Rose Gold Mangalsutra with Diamond Pendant
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black onyx beads. Features a modern hexagonal pendant studded with shimmering diamonds in a pave setting. The pendant offers a geometric contrast to the classic mangalsutra design.
description: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra, perfectly blending heritage with modern aesthetics. The rose gold finish offers a unique and stylish look, while the sparkling diamond pendant adds a touch of elegance. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, making it an ideal symbol of love and commitment.
